Name: SendEnvelopeToEmbededSign
Description: Use this action to send an e-mail as a reminder to sign the document to selected people.

Name: CheckAllDocumentsStatus
Description: Use this action to check the status of all documents sent to be signed and move all signed documents along the selected path.

Name: DeleteEnvelope
Description: This action allows you to cancel signing the document.

Name: SendRemind
Description: Use this action to send an e-mail as a reminder to sign the document to selected people.

Name: DownloadDocument
Description: The action downloads related signed document.

Name: CheckDocumentStatus
Description: This action checks the current status of the document sent to be signed.

Name: SendEnvelope
Description: Action sends selected documents to be signed in AdobeSign.
